column2:
go: http://www.awaretek.com/toolkits.html.  It suggests a tookit based on your criteria.  For me it suggests wxPython all the time.  Anyway it gives you a bunch of scores on the various toolkits.  What is right for me may not be right for you.  But it gives you how all the tookits scored according to your criteria, so if you don't like the top toolkit for some reason you can see which ones are closest to your criteria.
QT/GTK/WxWidgets (formerly wxWindows)
